title: The Electro-magnet
creator_credit: Harry Dance, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
brief_description: The principles and application of the electro-magnet, production of magnetic fields by simple experiments; effect of introducing iron cores; retention of magnetism by a steel core; use of electro-magnets in telephone receivers and telephone exchanges; a “self-starter” of a motor vehicle leads on to consideration of AC and DC motors.
creator_credit_for_label: Harry Dance, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
